Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and Anti-Inflammatory Activities of MAF-1-Derived Antimicrobial Peptide Mt6 and Its D-Enantiomer D-Mt6 against Acinetobacter baumannii by Targeting Cell Membranes and Lipopolysaccharide Interaction.
Literature.Author: Kong D, Hua X, Zhou R, Cui J, Wang T, Kong F, You HJ, Liu X, Adu-Amankwaah J, Guo G, Zheng K, Wu J, Tang R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=192µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=256µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>256µg/ml)
